org.mozilla.browser.impl

Class CocoaUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mozilla.browser.impl.CocoaUtils

  • public class CocoaUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for executing code on the AppKit thread

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Thread appkitThread 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CocoaUtils() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void asyncExecOnAppKitThread(java.lang.Runnable task)
      Executes the given task on the AppKit thread.
      static void runModal()
      Spins AppKit event loop until the method stopModal() is called;
      static void stopModal()
      Stops spinning of the AppKit event loop started in runModal()
      static void syncExecOnAppKitThread(RunnableEx task)
      Executes the given task on the AppKit thread.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static java.lang.Thread appkitThread

    • Constructor Detail

      • CocoaUtils

    • Method Detail

      • syncExecOnAppKitThread

        public static void syncExecOnAppKitThread(RunnableEx task)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the given task on the AppKit thread. During execution of this method, the method callbackOnAppKitThread() will be called on the AppKit thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • asyncExecOnAppKitThread

        public static void asyncExecOnAppKitThread(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Executes the given task on the AppKit thread. During execution of this method, the method callbackOnAppKitThread() will be called on the AppKit thread.

      • runModal

        public static void runModal()
        Spins AppKit event loop until the method stopModal() is called;

      • stopModal

        public static void stopModal()
        Stops spinning of the AppKit event loop started in runModal()
